holidays.title: National Mutt Day
holidays.description: This one's for the mutts! There's no ifs, ands, or mutts about it.

holidays.title: Asom Divas
holidays.description: Discover all there is to know about Assam’s influential ruler during the medieval ages.

holidays.title: Bartender Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Appreciate those in one of the world's oldest professions.

holidays.title: Business of Popping Corn Day
holidays.description: What would life be like without the heavenly smelling, buttery tasting, crunchy snack we all love?

holidays.title: International Day for the Abolition of Slavery
holidays.description: Slavery still benefits the world economy but at the cost of our humanity. It needs to stop!

holidays.title: International Sweater Vestival
holidays.description: You cannot deny that the fashion staple is making a fashionable comeback.

holidays.title: Lao National Day
holidays.description: Understand the story behind modern-day Laos and how it became a communist republic.

holidays.title: National Anytime Hawaiian Day
holidays.description: Dress up in Aloha shirts, wear leis, and get ready to groove to the pahu beat.

holidays.title: National Build Joy Day
holidays.description: A little kindness goes a long way and today is meant for just that — creating joy!

holidays.title: National Fritters Day
holidays.description: Fritters are easy to cook, and exist in different forms in cuisines all across the world.

holidays.title: National Katherine Day
holidays.description: Happy National Katherine Day to Katherines across the world! Celebrate right here with us!

holidays.title: National Skip School Day
holidays.description: Get ready for some out-of-the-classroom fun, or just slay in your pajamas on the couch.

holidays.title: Safety Razor Day
holidays.description: Safety razor shaving is the epitome of classic revolutionary low-tech inventions that changed our lives.

holidays.title: SKYWARN™ Recognition Day
holidays.description: Never fear, SKYWARN™ volunteers are here to keep you informed about the weather.

holidays.title: Special Education Day
holidays.description: Today is very special because every child deserves the best education available.

holidays.title: UAE National Day
holidays.description: The National Day of the UAE is a huge occasion that holds great historic relevance.

holidays.title: World Computer Literacy Day
holidays.description: Celebrate World Computer Literacy Day by extending a helping hand to those who could use it.

holidays.title: World Pollution Prevention Day
holidays.description: Show some love for Mother Earth and spread awareness about the perils of pollution.

holidays.title: Aaron Rodgers’s Birthday
holidays.description: He holds the N.F.L. record for “greatest touchdown to interception ratio.”

holidays.title: Abra’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper has set the pace for future Filipino rappers to come!

holidays.title: Action Bronson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Action Bronson has a rich career in music and the culinary arts — learn all about it.

holidays.title: Britney Spears’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this artist whose impact on mainstream music and pop culture remains undisputed.

holidays.title: Charlie Puth’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer-songwriter kept entertaining fans with his magical voice and musical ability.

holidays.title: Gianni Versace’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nurturing a skill learned from home could make someone successful. Versace's story is a case study!

holidays.title: Juice WRLD’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his unique vocal delivery and heartfelt lyrics, Juice WRLD’s songs speak for a generation.

holidays.title: Lucy Liu’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented actress has taken Hollywood by storm and is clearly on top.

holidays.title: Nailah Blackman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Unarguably, Nailah Blackman is putting Trinidad and Tobago music on the world map.

holidays.title: Nelly Furtado’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her voice is instantly recognizable and her music is loved to this day!

holidays.title: Pedro Vargas’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his exceptional voice, Pedro Vargas creates beautiful melodies that have a calming effect on everyone.

holidays.title: Ryker Person’s Birthday
holidays.description: Do you enjoy watching quality lip-sync and dance videos? Check out Ryker Person's TikTok page!

holidays.title: Ssundee’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube gamer and father still has much to offer the world!

holidays.title: Teairra Marí’s Birthday
holidays.description: Teairra Marí is a triple threat! Discover why as we celebrate her birthday!
